NeedDef.label: biomaterial
NeedDef.description: Biomaterial is necessary for this creature to remain productive. If it is at zero, the creature will stop producing resources until it is replenished. Generally, replenishing this will require light processing of organic materials to make a suitable intermediary called vegefodder.

NeedDef.label: protein
NeedDef.description: Protein is necessary for this creature to remain productive. If it is at zero, the creature may stop producing resources until it is replenished. Kibble is a perfect blend of processed proteins and binding plant, and is thus the ideal ingredient for productivity.

NeedDef.label: stone
NeedDef.description: Stone chunks are necessary for this creature to remain optimally productive. If it is at zero, the creature may stop producing resources until it is replenished. Bricks have had the trace minerals processed away, and thus cannot be used.
